availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth King Bryant in Harrison County, Kentucky, in December 1843. Father of Virginia Bryant, Mary Bryant, William Bryant, Adison Bryant, Susan Bryant, Stellatus Bryant, and Sarelda Bryant. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Employed John Nickols as a farm hand in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 114A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 480.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216885, p. 388.
